synopsis.text: Inspector Zenigata, MI6, Scotland Yard, and the legendary Sherlock Holmes are all on the tail of the notorious gentleman thief, Ars√®ne Lupin III, as he embarks on a daring quest to uncover the elusive treasure of The Raven, a secret society believed to be manipulating the British government. The chase becomes personal when Lupin is accused of murdering Holmes' trusted partner, Dr. Watson, and the race is on for Lupin to clear his name and expose the true culprits. With torn clues and relentless pursuers, Lupin and his gang must navigate a web of danger and deceit to unravel the mystery of The Raven and its hidden riches, all while staying one step ahead of the brilliant detective determined to bring him to justice.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
